TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InvokeMethodOptions extends System.Management.ManagementOptions

summary.span: 指定叫用 (Invoke) 管理方法的選項。

span.span: Specifies options for invoking a management method.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會叫用**Win32_Process::Create**方法，以啟動 Calc.exe 的新程序。The following example invokes the **Win32_Process::Create** method to start a new process of Calc.exe. 類別用來叫用方法。The class is used to invoke the method. [!code-csharp[wminet_InvokeMethodOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_InvokeMethodOptions/cs/InvokeMethodOptions.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_InvokeMethodOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_InvokeMethodOptions/vb/InvokeMethodOptions.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以進行叫用作業。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for an invoke operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 作業的 類別新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the operation, using default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會叫用**Win32_Process::Create**方法，以啟動 Calc.exe 的新程序。The following example invokes the **Win32_Process::Create** method to start a new process of Calc.exe. 預設建構函式類別使用。The default constructor of the class is used. param.name: context

param.span: 在時間用盡前，要執行作業的時間長度。預設值是 。

span.span: The length of time to let the operation perform before it times out. The default value is .

param.span: 設定這個參數會半同步叫用作業。

span.span: Setting this parameter will invoke the operation semisynchronously.

summary.span: 使用指定值，初始化叫用作業的 類別新執行個體。
